title: SDA slide reveals Tranche 0 optical terminal manufacturers
summary: “I'm going to do competitions for every Tranche, every layer, every time and it's going to be full and open,” Space Development Agency director Derek Tournear said. “The only way we can do that is if I make sure all the satellites work together as a network."

title: NASA gives green light for space station spacewalks to resume
summary: NASA is ready to resume spacewalks outside the International Space Station after completing an investigation of water found in a spacesuit during a spacewalk earlier this year.

title: Inmarsat sale clears Australia’s foreign investment watchdog
summary: Viasat said Oct. 18 it got the nod from Australia’s foreign investment regulator to take over Inmarsat, although the deal remains subject to regulatory approvals elsewhere.

title: Pentagon: It’s up to SpaceX to decide what to do about Starlink in Ukraine
summary: Pentagon press secretary Pat Ryder said Oct. 18 DoD would not comment on Elon Musk's recent tweets about Starlink services in Ukraine

title: Eutelsat fortifying jamming defenses over Middle East
summary: Eutelsat is preparing to deploy the first of two new jamming-resistant broadcast satellites over the Middle East following signal interference in Iran.
